topics.body:
"@Joshua":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55171dfd63687260ad7b0600#post_55171dfd63687260ad7b0600
Judging by the bold, all caps, stupid amount of exclamation marks, and having to tell us you are crying as hard as possible, I'm going to assume you are trying to get attention and lying

If you are not lying and your dog actually died, you have my condolences, but stop typing like that or people will just think you are an immature idiot

topics.body:
"@Joshua":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55171dfd63687260ad7b0600#post_55171dfd63687260ad7b0600

Joshua, i have a dog so i can relate to your suffering.

But that doesn't excuse you to act like an asshole to other people when they dont have a reason to care in the first place. Please, calm down, THINK before speaking. Take some time away from the site to collect yourself.
